23namespace webrtc {
24namespace {
25
26constexpr float kSpatialLayeringRateScalingFactor = 0.55f;
27constexpr float kTemporalLayeringRateScalingFactor = 0.55f;
28
29struct ActiveSpatialLayers {
30 size_t first = 0;
31 size_t num = 0;
32};
33
34ActiveSpatialLayers GetActiveSpatialLayers(const VideoCodec& codec,
35 size_t num_spatial_layers) {
36 ActiveSpatialLayers active;
37 for (active.first = 0; active.first < num_spatial_layers; ++active.first) {
38 if (codec.spatialLayers[active.first].active) {
39 break;
40 }
41 }
42
43 size_t last_active_layer = active.first;
44 for (; last_active_layer < num_spatial_layers; ++last_active_layer) {
45 if (!codec.spatialLayers[last_active_layer].active) {
46 break;
47 }
48 }
49 active.num = last_active_layer - active.first;
50
51 return active;
52}
53
54std::vector<DataRate> AdjustAndVerify(
55 const VideoCodec& codec,
56 size_t first_active_layer,
57 const std::vector<DataRate>& spatial_layer_rates) {
58 std::vector<DataRate> adjusted_spatial_layer_rates;
59 // Keep track of rate that couldn't be applied to the previous layer due to
60 // max bitrate constraint, try to pass it forward to the next one.
61 DataRate excess_rate = DataRate::Zero();
62 for (size_t sl_idx = 0; sl_idx < spatial_layer_rates.size(); ++sl_idx) {
63 DataRate min_rate = DataRate::KilobitsPerSec(
64 codec.spatialLayers[first_active_layer + sl_idx].minBitrate);
65 DataRate max_rate = DataRate::KilobitsPerSec(
66 codec.spatialLayers[first_active_layer + sl_idx].maxBitrate);
67
68 DataRate layer_rate = spatial_layer_rates[sl_idx] + excess_rate;
69 if (layer_rate < min_rate) {
70 // Not enough rate to reach min bitrate for desired number of layers,
71 // abort allocation.
72 if (spatial_layer_rates.size() == 1) {
73 return spatial_layer_rates;
74 }
75 return adjusted_spatial_layer_rates;
76 }
77
78 if (layer_rate <= max_rate) {
79 excess_rate = DataRate::Zero();
80 adjusted_spatial_layer_rates.push_back(layer_rate);
81 } else {
82 excess_rate = layer_rate - max_rate;
83 adjusted_spatial_layer_rates.push_back(max_rate);
84 }
85 }
86
87 return adjusted_spatial_layer_rates;
88}
89
90static std::vector<DataRate> SplitBitrate(size_t num_layers,
91 DataRate total_bitrate,
92 float rate_scaling_factor) {
93 std::vector<DataRate> bitrates;
94
95 double denominator = 0.0;
96 for (size_t layer_idx = 0; layer_idx < num_layers; ++layer_idx) {
97 denominator += std::pow(rate_scaling_factor, layer_idx);
98 }
99
100 double numerator = std::pow(rate_scaling_factor, num_layers - 1);
101 for (size_t layer_idx = 0; layer_idx < num_layers; ++layer_idx) {
102 bitrates.push_back(numerator * total_bitrate / denominator);
103 numerator /= rate_scaling_factor;
104 }
105
106 const DataRate sum =
107 std::accumulate(bitrates.begin(), bitrates.end(), DataRate::Zero());
108
109 // Keep the sum of split bitrates equal to the total bitrate by adding or
110 // subtracting bits, which were lost due to rounding, to the latest layer.
111 if (total_bitrate > sum) {
112 bitrates.back() += total_bitrate - sum;
113 } else if (total_bitrate < sum) {
114 bitrates.back() -= sum - total_bitrate;
115 }
116
117 return bitrates;
118}
119
120// Returns the minimum bitrate needed for |num_active_layers| spatial layers to
121// become active using the configuration specified by |codec|.
122DataRate FindLayerTogglingThreshold(const VideoCodec& codec,
123 size_t first_active_layer,
124 size_t num_active_layers) {
125 if (num_active_layers == 1) {
126 return DataRate::KilobitsPerSec(codec.spatialLayers[0].minBitrate);
127 }
128
129 if (codec.mode == VideoCodecMode::kRealtimeVideo) {
130 DataRate lower_bound = DataRate::Zero();
131 DataRate upper_bound = DataRate::Zero();
132 if (num_active_layers > 1) {
133 for (size_t i = 0; i < num_active_layers - 1; ++i) {
134 lower_bound += DataRate::KilobitsPerSec(
135 codec.spatialLayers[first_active_layer + i].minBitrate);
136 upper_bound += DataRate::KilobitsPerSec(
137 codec.spatialLayers[first_active_layer + i].maxBitrate);
138 }
139 }
140 upper_bound += DataRate::KilobitsPerSec(
141 codec.spatialLayers[first_active_layer + num_active_layers - 1]
142 .minBitrate);
143
144 // Do a binary search until upper and lower bound is the highest bitrate for
145 // |num_active_layers| - 1 layers and lowest bitrate for |num_active_layers|
146 // layers respectively.
147 while (upper_bound - lower_bound > DataRate::BitsPerSec(1)) {
148 DataRate try_rate = (lower_bound + upper_bound) / 2;
149 if (AdjustAndVerify(codec, first_active_layer,
150 SplitBitrate(num_active_layers, try_rate,
151 kSpatialLayeringRateScalingFactor))
152 .size() == num_active_layers) {
153 upper_bound = try_rate;
154 } else {
155 lower_bound = try_rate;
156 }
157 }
158 return upper_bound;
159 } else {
160 DataRate toggling_rate = DataRate::Zero();
161 for (size_t i = 0; i < num_active_layers - 1; ++i) {
162 toggling_rate += DataRate::KilobitsPerSec(
163 codec.spatialLayers[first_active_layer + i].targetBitrate);
164 }
165 toggling_rate += DataRate::KilobitsPerSec(
166 codec.spatialLayers[first_active_layer + num_active_layers - 1]
167 .minBitrate);
168 return toggling_rate;
169 }
170}
171
172} // namespace
173
174SvcRateAllocator::NumLayers SvcRateAllocator::GetNumLayers(
175 const VideoCodec& codec) {
176 NumLayers layers;
177 if (!codec.ScalabilityMode().empty()) {
178 if (auto structure = CreateScalabilityStructure(codec.ScalabilityMode())) {
179 ScalableVideoController::StreamLayersConfig config =
180 structure->StreamConfig();
181 layers.spatial = config.num_spatial_layers;
182 layers.temporal = config.num_temporal_layers;
183 return layers;
184 }
185 }
186 if (codec.codecType == kVideoCodecVP9) {
187 layers.spatial = codec.VP9().numberOfSpatialLayers;
188 layers.temporal = codec.VP9().numberOfTemporalLayers;
189 return layers;
190 }
191 layers.spatial = 1;
192 layers.temporal = 1;
193 return layers;
194}
195
196SvcRateAllocator::SvcRateAllocator(const VideoCodec& codec)
197 : codec_(codec),
198 num_layers_(GetNumLayers(codec)),
199 experiment_settings_(StableTargetRateExperiment::ParseFromFieldTrials()),
200 cumulative_layer_start_bitrates_(GetLayerStartBitrates(codec)),
201 last_active_layer_count_(0) {
202 RTC_DCHECK_GT(num_layers_.spatial, 0);
203 RTC_DCHECK_LE(num_layers_.spatial, kMaxSpatialLayers);
204 RTC_DCHECK_GT(num_layers_.temporal, 0);
205 RTC_DCHECK_LE(num_layers_.temporal, 3);
206 for (size_t layer_idx = 0; layer_idx < num_layers_.spatial; ++layer_idx) {
207 // Verify min <= target <= max.
208 if (codec.spatialLayers[layer_idx].active) {
209 RTC_DCHECK_GT(codec.spatialLayers[layer_idx].maxBitrate, 0);
210 RTC_DCHECK_GE(codec.spatialLayers[layer_idx].maxBitrate,
211 codec.spatialLayers[layer_idx].minBitrate);
212 RTC_DCHECK_GE(codec.spatialLayers[layer_idx].targetBitrate,
213 codec.spatialLayers[layer_idx].minBitrate);
214 RTC_DCHECK_GE(codec.spatialLayers[layer_idx].maxBitrate,
215 codec.spatialLayers[layer_idx].targetBitrate);
216 }
217 }
218}
219
220VideoBitrateAllocation SvcRateAllocator::Allocate(
221 VideoBitrateAllocationParameters parameters) {
222 DataRate total_bitrate = parameters.total_bitrate;
223 if (codec_.maxBitrate != 0) {
224 total_bitrate =
225 std::min(total_bitrate, DataRate::KilobitsPerSec(codec_.maxBitrate));
226 }
227
228 if (codec_.spatialLayers[0].targetBitrate == 0) {
229 // Delegate rate distribution to encoder wrapper if bitrate thresholds
230 // are not set.
231 VideoBitrateAllocation bitrate_allocation;
232 bitrate_allocation.SetBitrate(0, 0, total_bitrate.bps());
233 return bitrate_allocation;
234 }
235
236 const ActiveSpatialLayers active_layers =
237 GetActiveSpatialLayers(codec_, num_layers_.spatial);
238 size_t num_spatial_layers = active_layers.num;
239
240 if (num_spatial_layers == 0) {
241 return VideoBitrateAllocation(); // All layers are deactivated.
242 }
243
244 // Figure out how many spatial layers should be active.
245 if (experiment_settings_.IsEnabled() &&
246 parameters.stable_bitrate > DataRate::Zero()) {
247 double hysteresis_factor;
248 if (codec_.mode == VideoCodecMode::kScreensharing) {
249 hysteresis_factor = experiment_settings_.GetScreenshareHysteresisFactor();
250 } else {
251 hysteresis_factor = experiment_settings_.GetVideoHysteresisFactor();
252 }
253
254 DataRate stable_rate =
255 std::min(parameters.total_bitrate, parameters.stable_bitrate);
256 // First check if bitrate has grown large enough to enable new layers.
257 size_t num_enabled_with_hysteresis =
258 FindNumEnabledLayers(stable_rate / hysteresis_factor);
259 if (num_enabled_with_hysteresis >= last_active_layer_count_) {
260 num_spatial_layers = num_enabled_with_hysteresis;
261 } else {
262 // We could not enable new layers, check if any should be disabled.
263 num_spatial_layers =
264 std::min(last_active_layer_count_, FindNumEnabledLayers(stable_rate));
265 }
266 } else {
267 num_spatial_layers = FindNumEnabledLayers(parameters.total_bitrate);
268 }
269 last_active_layer_count_ = num_spatial_layers;
270
271 VideoBitrateAllocation allocation;
272 if (codec_.mode == VideoCodecMode::kRealtimeVideo) {
273 allocation = GetAllocationNormalVideo(total_bitrate, active_layers.first,
274 num_spatial_layers);
275 } else {
276 allocation = GetAllocationScreenSharing(total_bitrate, active_layers.first,
277 num_spatial_layers);
278 }
279 allocation.set_bw_limited(num_spatial_layers < active_layers.num);
280 return allocation;
281}
282
283VideoBitrateAllocation SvcRateAllocator::GetAllocationNormalVideo(
284 DataRate total_bitrate,
285 size_t first_active_layer,
286 size_t num_spatial_layers) const {
287 std::vector<DataRate> spatial_layer_rates;
288 if (num_spatial_layers == 0) {
289 // Not enough rate for even the base layer. Force allocation at the total
290 // bitrate anyway.
291 num_spatial_layers = 1;
292 spatial_layer_rates.push_back(total_bitrate);
293 } else {
294 spatial_layer_rates =
295 AdjustAndVerify(codec_, first_active_layer,
296 SplitBitrate(num_spatial_layers, total_bitrate,
297 kSpatialLayeringRateScalingFactor));
298 RTC_DCHECK_EQ(spatial_layer_rates.size(), num_spatial_layers);
299 }
300
301 VideoBitrateAllocation bitrate_allocation;
302
303 for (size_t sl_idx = 0; sl_idx < num_spatial_layers; ++sl_idx) {
304 std::vector<DataRate> temporal_layer_rates =
305 SplitBitrate(num_layers_.temporal, spatial_layer_rates[sl_idx],
306 kTemporalLayeringRateScalingFactor);
307
308 // Distribute rate across temporal layers. Allocate more bits to lower
309 // layers since they are used for prediction of higher layers and their
310 // references are far apart.
311 if (num_layers_.temporal == 1) {
312 bitrate_allocation.SetBitrate(sl_idx + first_active_layer, 0,
313 temporal_layer_rates[0].bps());
314 } else if (num_layers_.temporal == 2) {
315 bitrate_allocation.SetBitrate(sl_idx + first_active_layer, 0,
316 temporal_layer_rates[1].bps());
317 bitrate_allocation.SetBitrate(sl_idx + first_active_layer, 1,
318 temporal_layer_rates[0].bps());
319 } else {
320 RTC_CHECK_EQ(num_layers_.temporal, 3);
321 // In case of three temporal layers the high layer has two frames and the
322 // middle layer has one frame within GOP (in between two consecutive low
323 // layer frames). Thus high layer requires more bits (comparing pure
324 // bitrate of layer, excluding bitrate of base layers) to keep quality on
325 // par with lower layers.
326 bitrate_allocation.SetBitrate(sl_idx + first_active_layer, 0,
327 temporal_layer_rates[2].bps());
328 bitrate_allocation.SetBitrate(sl_idx + first_active_layer, 1,
329 temporal_layer_rates[0].bps());
330 bitrate_allocation.SetBitrate(sl_idx + first_active_layer, 2,
331 temporal_layer_rates[1].bps());
332 }
333 }
334
335 return bitrate_allocation;
336}
337
338// Bit-rate is allocated in such a way, that the highest enabled layer will have
339// between min and max bitrate, and all others will have exactly target
340// bit-rate allocated.
341VideoBitrateAllocation SvcRateAllocator::GetAllocationScreenSharing(
342 DataRate total_bitrate,
343 size_t first_active_layer,
344 size_t num_spatial_layers) const {
345 VideoBitrateAllocation bitrate_allocation;
346
347 if (num_spatial_layers == 0 ||
348 total_bitrate <
349 DataRate::KilobitsPerSec(
350 codec_.spatialLayers[first_active_layer].minBitrate)) {
351 // Always enable at least one layer.
352 bitrate_allocation.SetBitrate(first_active_layer, 0, total_bitrate.bps());
353 return bitrate_allocation;
354 }
355
356 DataRate allocated_rate = DataRate::Zero();
357 DataRate top_layer_rate = DataRate::Zero();
358 size_t sl_idx;
359 for (sl_idx = first_active_layer;
360 sl_idx < first_active_layer + num_spatial_layers; ++sl_idx) {
361 const DataRate min_rate =
362 DataRate::KilobitsPerSec(codec_.spatialLayers[sl_idx].minBitrate);
363 const DataRate target_rate =
364 DataRate::KilobitsPerSec(codec_.spatialLayers[sl_idx].targetBitrate);
365
366 if (allocated_rate + min_rate > total_bitrate) {
367 // Use stable rate to determine if layer should be enabled.
368 break;
369 }
370
371 top_layer_rate = std::min(target_rate, total_bitrate - allocated_rate);
372 bitrate_allocation.SetBitrate(sl_idx, 0, top_layer_rate.bps());
373 allocated_rate += top_layer_rate;
374 }
375
376 if (sl_idx > 0 && total_bitrate - allocated_rate > DataRate::Zero()) {
377 // Add leftover to the last allocated layer.
378 top_layer_rate = std::min(
379 top_layer_rate + (total_bitrate - allocated_rate),
380 DataRate::KilobitsPerSec(codec_.spatialLayers[sl_idx - 1].maxBitrate));
381 bitrate_allocation.SetBitrate(sl_idx - 1, 0, top_layer_rate.bps());
382 }
383
384 return bitrate_allocation;
385}
386
387size_t SvcRateAllocator::FindNumEnabledLayers(DataRate target_rate) const {
388 if (cumulative_layer_start_bitrates_.empty()) {
389 return 0;
390 }
391
392 size_t num_enabled_layers = 0;
393 for (DataRate start_rate : cumulative_layer_start_bitrates_) {
394 // First layer is always enabled.
395 if (num_enabled_layers == 0 || start_rate <= target_rate) {
396 ++num_enabled_layers;
397 } else {
398 break;
399 }
400 }
401
402 return num_enabled_layers;
403}
404
405DataRate SvcRateAllocator::GetMaxBitrate(const VideoCodec& codec) {
406 const NumLayers num_layers = GetNumLayers(codec);
407 const ActiveSpatialLayers active_layers =
408 GetActiveSpatialLayers(codec, num_layers.spatial);
409
410 DataRate max_bitrate = DataRate::Zero();
411 for (size_t sl_idx = 0; sl_idx < active_layers.num; ++sl_idx) {
412 max_bitrate += DataRate::KilobitsPerSec(
413 codec.spatialLayers[active_layers.first + sl_idx].maxBitrate);
414 }
415
416 if (codec.maxBitrate != 0) {
417 max_bitrate =
418 std::min(max_bitrate, DataRate::KilobitsPerSec(codec.maxBitrate));
419 }
420
421 return max_bitrate;
422}
423
424DataRate SvcRateAllocator::GetPaddingBitrate(const VideoCodec& codec) {
425 auto start_bitrate = GetLayerStartBitrates(codec);
426 if (start_bitrate.empty()) {
427 return DataRate::Zero(); // All layers are deactivated.
428 }
429
430 return start_bitrate.back();
431}
432
433absl::InlinedVector<DataRate, kMaxSpatialLayers>
434SvcRateAllocator::GetLayerStartBitrates(const VideoCodec& codec) {
435 absl::InlinedVector<DataRate, kMaxSpatialLayers> start_bitrates;
436 const NumLayers num_layers = GetNumLayers(codec);
437 const ActiveSpatialLayers active_layers =
438 GetActiveSpatialLayers(codec, num_layers.spatial);
439 DataRate last_rate = DataRate::Zero();
440 for (size_t i = 1; i <= active_layers.num; ++i) {
441 DataRate layer_toggling_rate =
442 FindLayerTogglingThreshold(codec, active_layers.first, i);
443 start_bitrates.push_back(layer_toggling_rate);
444 RTC_DCHECK_LE(last_rate, layer_toggling_rate);
445 last_rate = layer_toggling_rate;
446 }
447 return start_bitrates;
448}
